certificateDescription: I completed a deep dive into LangChain for LLM application development, exploring its integrations, prompt chaining, memory, and agent-based workflows to build powerful AI-driven apps.

I explored Google's Attention Mechanism, understanding its role in transforming NLP by enabling models to focus on relevant parts of input sequences, leading to advancements like Transformers and GPT.
I completed Intermediate Python from DataCamp, enhancing my skills in data handling, OOP, and efficient scripting.
